H0.text: What was the name of the horse in Steptoe and Son. Trigger

H1.text: What was the name of the horse in Steptoe and Son. Mr. Ed

H2.text: What was the name of the horse in Steptoe and Son. Black Beauty

H3.text: What was the name of the horse in Steptoe and Son. Hurcules

A4.text: the opening sequences would often feature the Steptoes' horse, Hercules.
